name: Shrifter
description:
Shrifter is a side scroller shoot em up where you can switch between two dimensions!
See how far you get without any hits - Killing fighters grants extra points.

My entry for the Mouse Jam by 8 Bits to Infinity

Controls:

LMB - Shoot / slow down time
RMB- Shift dimension (and temporary invulnerability)
MMB - mute / unmute audio
